=Using TortoiseSVN=

TortoiseSVN is a simple to use tool for the Subversion version control system that is employed by GoogleCode.  It integrates neatly with Windows explorer making it a good choice for checking out, updating and committing changes to the code repository.

Here we demonstrate how to install and use it.  Detailed instructions on it's use can be found at the [http://tortoisesvn.tigris.org/ TortoiseSVN website]
